description: Set up deployment configuration for the chosen hosting platform. Includes: choosing deployment platform, configuring deployment settings, setting up CI/CD, configuring redirects, setting up monitoring, and documentation.

Task 4: Accessibility (A11y) Optimization - WCAG 2.1 AA Compliance
Task 6: Migrate Main Pages (Root Level)
description: Migrate all root-level HTML pages to Astro pages, maintaining exact layout and functionality. Includes: index.html, blog.html, log-in.html, sign-up.html, assine.html, checkout.html, init-checkout.html, paypal-checkout.html, order-confirmation.html, search.html, user-account.html, reset-password.html, update-password.html, access-denied.html, 401.html, 404.html, br-only.html, politicas.html, parcerias.html, ebook.html, afiliado-hotmart.html (21 pages total).

title: Task 15: Documentation & Handoff
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the migrated codebase. Includes: creating README.md, documenting component structure, documenting page structure, documenting utilities, migration notes, and API documentation.

title: Task 1: Project Setup and Astro Initialization
description: Initialize a new Astro project with proper configuration, TypeScript support, and project structure that mirrors the current HTML structure. Includes: installing Astro CLI, configuring astro.config.mjs, setting up TypeScript, creating directory structure, migrating static assets, and setting up environment variables.

title: Task 5: Migrate Third-Party Integrations
description: Migrate all third-party scripts and integrations to Astro-compatible format. Includes: Google Analytics & Tag Manager, Clerk Authentication, Finsweet CMS Load & Filter, Mautic Tracking, Slater Integration, Ahrefs Analytics, jQuery migration, and Webflow.js.

title: Task 8: Migrate JNG Subdirectory Pages
description: Migrate all pages from src/jng/ directory to Astro routes under /jng path. Includes: jobs.html, jobs-brs-only.html, jobs-with-vista-sponsors.html, member-dashboard.html, my-account.html, onboarding.html, partners.html, community.html, job-search.html, resume-generator.html, interview-q-a.html, course.html, companies-hiring.html (13 pages total). All routes are protected and require authentication.

title: Task 1: Project Setup and Astro Initialization
description: Initialize a new Astro project with proper configuration, TypeScript support, and project structure that mirrors the current HTML structure. Includes: installing Astro CLI, configuring astro.config.mjs, setting up TypeScript, creating directory structure, migrating static assets, and setting up environment variables.

title: Task 9: Migrate Other Subdirectory Pages
description: Migrate pages from basic/, lp/, members/, payment/, products/ directories. Includes: basic/dashboard.html, lp/assine-basic.html, lp/workshop-busca-de-vagas.html, members/chatgpt.html, payment/success.html, products/jobhunting.html, products/networking.html, products/personal-branding.html (8 pages total).

title: Task 2: Extract and Migrate CSS Files
description: Migrate all CSS files to Astro-compatible format, maintaining exact styling and organization. Includes: migrating normalize.css, webflow.css, jobnagringa.webflow.css, extracting inline styles, creating global styles entry point, and setting up CSS in Astro layout.

title: Task 13: Build Configuration & Optimization
description: Configure Astro build settings, optimizations, and production-ready configuration. Includes: configuring build settings, setting up image optimization, configuring sitemap, setting up RSS feed, configuring environment variables, optimizing CSS and JavaScript, and setting up error pages.

title: Task 4: Migrate JavaScript Functionality
description: Extract and refactor all JavaScript code into Astro-compatible modules and client-side scripts. Includes: Clerk authentication scripts, UTM tracking, loading button handler, protected paths logic, Mautic tracking, API configuration, Slater integration, Webflow.js functionality, and client script loader component.

title: Task 2: Set Up Lighthouse CI Infrastructure and Baseline Reports
Task 3: Extract Reusable Components
description: Identify and extract common HTML patterns into reusable Astro components. Includes: Navigation component, Footer component, Job Card component, Button component, Form components (Input, Select, Checkbox), Layout components (BaseLayout, PageLayout, DashboardLayout), and Head component.

title: Task 5: Best Practices Optimization - Security, HTTPS, and Modern Standards
EPIC: Lighthouse Performance Optimization - Achieve 100 Score on All Metrics
Task 3: Performance Optimization - Core Web Vitals and Loading Speed
Task 11: Implement Authentication & Protected Routes
description: Set up Clerk authentication integration with Astro middleware for protected routes. Includes: installing Clerk Astro integration, creating authentication middleware, creating auth utilities, updating protected pages, handling user data, and implementing role-based access.

title: Task 6: SEO Optimization - Meta Tags, Structure, and Crawlability
Task 7: Migrate Detail Pages
description: Migrate all detail pages (detail_*.html) to Astro dynamic routes. Includes: detail_post.html, detail_jobs.html, detail_job-category.html, detail_job-boards.html, detail_category.html, detail_product.html, detail_sku.html, detail_author.html, detail_people.html, detail_partners.html, detail_afiliado.html, detail_videos.html, detail_aulas.html, detail_modulo.html, detail_eventos.html, detail_qa.html, detail_qa-tags.html, detail_resume-review.html, detail_chatgpt.html, detail_hub-link.html (20 detail pages total).

title: Task 12: Testing & Visual Verification
description: Comprehensive testing to ensure pixel-perfect layout fidelity and functionality preservation. Includes: visual regression testing setup, page-by-page visual comparison, functionality testing, cross-browser testing, performance testing, and accessibility testing.

title: Task 10: Handle Webflow CMS Integration
description: Replace Webflow CMS functionality (fs-cmsload, fs-cmsfilter) with Astro data fetching. Includes: identifying CMS usage, setting up data fetching, replacing CMS Load, replacing CMS Filter, handling CMS collections (jobs, blog posts, categories, partners), and implementing pagination.
